main-content.name: Nutthapon Punprasitwech
main-content.introduce: As a computer science graduate with an interest in game development and artificial intelligence, I spent two years learning and developing games on my own. In addition, I dedicated time to studying the AI used in games, including reinforcement learning. My passion for these areas has driven me to constantly learn and improve my skills in these areas.

about-me.text: I am a junior game programmer currently working at Urnique Studio in Bangkok, Thailand. In addition to my full-time job, I am also pursuing freelance work in game development and web development. I am constantly learning and striving to expand my skillset and grow as a developer.
